author: barnabasbusa
content: we initially planned to launch devnet 10 today, but it seems like we will have to postpone it to monday, as we still missing quite some clients that have a branch with the updated kzg lib.

author: barnabasbusa
content: We would like to ask all missing clients to have at least a branch ready to test by monday morning though.

author: barnabasbusa
content:
Proposed Devnet 10 genesis time:
```
Epoch timestamp: 1698051540
Timestamp in milliseconds: 1698051540000
Date and time (GMT): Monday, 23 October 2023 08:59:00
Date and time (your time zone): Monday, 23 October 2023 10:59:00 GMT+02:00
Genesis delay: 60 seconds
```
Client images:

EL:
**Geth**: `ethpandaops/geth:lightclient-devnet-10-4d161de` âœ… 
**Erigon**: `ethpandaops/erigon:devel-106e880` âœ… 
**Nethermind**: `ethpandaops/nethermind:upgrade-ckzg-75a4b33` âœ… 
**Ethereumjs**: `ethpandaops/ethereumjs:update-official-setup-468c4cc` âœ… 
**Besu**: `ethpandaops/besu:main-9d9fe8c` âœ… 
**Reth**: `ethpandaops/reth:main-9dd270e` âœ… 

CL:
**Prysm**: `ethpandaops/prysm:devnet-10-b83d0a0,ethpandaops`,`prysm-validator:devnet-10-linux-amd64-b83d0a0` âœ… 
**Lighthouse**: `ethpandaops/lighthouse:devnet-10-b7a3f52` âœ…
**Lodestar**: `ethpandaops/lodestar:deneb-builder-dafe3ca` âœ…
**Teku**: `ethpandaops/teku:master-d418f8d` âœ…
**Nimbus**: `ethpandaops/nimbus:unstable-a986a1b` âœ… 

We are happy to launch the network with the currently available client pairs, but would be very good if nimbus and reth would also be ready by Monday morning.
Please let me know if your image needs to be updated before/after the genesis. 
Every client with a âœ…  is confirmed to have passed basic interop on kurtosis. 
You can test out yourself basic interop with kurtosis using this example json file: https://github.com/ethpandaops/dencun-testnet/blob/bbusa/devnet-10/kurtosis/devnet-10.json

To run kurtosis with this json, download the json file, call it devnet-10.json and run kurtosis with
 ```
kurtosis run github.com/kurtosis-tech/ethereum-package --args-file devnet-10.json
```
This will spin up 20 nodes (so you need a beefy local machine).

Spec list: https://notes.ethereum.org/@ethpandaops/dencun-devnet-10

If you got any questions let me or <@199561711278227457> know.
